page.title: 05BANBURY LAWN MOWER REPAIRS
page.content: BANBURY LAWN MOWER AND CHAINSAW REPAIR SERVICE IS A SMALL LOCAL BUSINESS.IT HAS BEEN IN ITS PRESENT POSITION BY THE CANAL FOR 3 YRS.BEFORE THIS IT WAS ON THE OPPOSITE SIDE OF THE ROAD.AS THE NAME IMPLIES,THEY REPAIR LAWN MOWERS AND CHAINSAWS.OCCASIONALLY THEY SELL NEW OR RECONDITIONED ITEMS.THE COMPANY EMPLOYS 3 MECHANICS AND 1 PERSON TO DO THE PAPER WORK (INCLUDING THE OWNERS). {CANAL SHOP} ADJOINING THIS THE OWNERS HAVE A SHOP.THIS IS ON THE SIDE OF THE CANAL WITH A CONCRETE MORING AREA.THE SHOP SERVES THE CANAL TRAFFIC ONLY AND SELLS A WIDE VARIETY OF GOODS, INCLUDING FREE RANGE EGGS WHICH ARE LAID BY THEIR HENS.ONE WOMAN WORKS IN THE SHOP AND 1 PERSON IS EMPLOYED AS A STAND IN FOR BOTH BUSINESSES AND TO LOOK AFTER THE HENS.THE SHOP STAYS OPEN AS LONG AS THERE IS TRAFFIC ON THE CANAL.
